document.full_text: in a week of the most public of celebrations - the royal wedding, that is - britain has been much preoccupied with secrecy and private deeds deemed so nefarious that they may not be named.
document.title: letter from europe: britain debates the bounds of privacy
lines_and_colors: in a week of the most public of celebrations - the royal wedding, that is - britain has been much preoccupied with secrecy and private deeds deemed so nefarious that they may not be named.
